cast.name: 杰西卡·麦辛哲 Jessica Messenger

writer.name: 西蒙·P·爱德华兹 Simon P Edwards

director.name: 西蒙·P·爱德华兹 Simon P Edwards

introduction: Beneath a Neon Tide is the story of a troubled young man, Andy whose life is following a self destructive pattern which shows no sign of ending. When tragedy strikes, Andy's parents are forced to act and send him to live with his loving uncle David in rural Norfolk. The change of scenery and lifestyle begin to open Andy's eyes to much more than the errors of his own ways. Written by Simon P. Edwards
